[Tree](https://material.angular.io/components/tree) API for divider ## API reference for Angular Material divider ` import {MatDividerModule} from '@angular/material/divider'; ` content\_copy ### [link](https://material.angular.io/components/divider/api\#directives) Directives #### [link](https://material.angular.io/components/divider/api\#MatDivider) `MatDivider` Selector:mat-divider ##### Properties | Name | Description | | --- | --- | | @Input()
`inset: boolean` | Whether the divider is an inset divider. | | @Input()
`vertical: boolean` | Whether the divider is vertically aligned. | ## API reference for Angular Material divider-testing ` import {MatDividerHarness} from '@angular/material/divider/testing'; ` content\_copy ### [link](https://material.angular.io/components/divider/api\#classes) Classes #### [link](https://material.angular.io/components/divider/api\#MatDividerHarness) `MatDividerHarness`extends [ComponentHarness](https://material.angular.io/components/divider/cdk/testing/api\#ComponentHarness) Harness for interacting with a `mat-divider`. ##### Properties | Name | Description | | --- | --- | | `static hostSelector: '.mat-divider'` | | ##### Methods | async

getOrientation | | --- | | Returns | | --- | | `Promise<'horizontal' | 'vertical'>` | | | async

host | | --- | | Gets a `Promise` for the `TestElement` representing the host element of the component. | | Returns | | --- | | `Promise` | | | async

isInset | | --- | | Returns | | --- | | `Promise` | | | static

with | | --- | | Parameters | | --- | | options
`DividerHarnessFilters = {}` | | ### [link](https://material.angular.io/components/divider/api\#interfaces) Interfaces #### [link](https://material.angular.io/components/divider/api\#DividerHarnessFilters) `DividerHarnessFilters` Divider Testing Azure & Blue theme selected. Select a version of the documentation Select a theme for the documentation Copy import to the clipboard
title: Divider | Angular Material
description: UI component infrastructure and Material Design components for mobile and desktop Angular web applications.
keywords: angular, material design, material, angular material, web, ui, components, responsive, accessibility, typescript, css, mobile web, open source
